description:
Admiral Dwight Greenhill was a highly respected officer, who served as chief of staff to http://anidb.net/ch744 [Fleet Admiral Sidney Sitolet] and later to http://anidb.net/ch769 [Fleet Admiral Lazll Lobos] during the invasion of the Galactic Empire in SC 796. His daughter was http://anidb.net/ch749 [Frederica Greenhill].
He led the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council] during the military coup d`etat on Heinessen.
name: Dwight Greenhill
